headline: Silvaco Group Appoints Semiconductor Veteran Chris Zegarelli as Chief Financial Officer
summary: Silvaco Group Inc. (NASDAQ:SVCO) is one of the best IPO tech stocks to buy now. On September 4, Silvaco Group announced the appointment of Chris Zegarelli as its new Chief Financial Officer, following a comprehensive search. His appointment is effective as of September 15. Zegarelli will serve as a senior member of the executive team […]
